name: wagmios
description: Wagmios is a self-hosted dashboard for monitoring crypto wallets or DeFi positions, aggregating balances and metrics into a clear web interface for long-term holders.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track multiple crypto wallets and DeFi positions across different blockchains in one unified dashboard

features.title: Balance Aggregation
features.description: Automatically aggregate token balances and display total portfolio value with real-time price updates

features.title: Transaction History
features.description: View complete transaction logs with timestamps, amounts, and gas fees for comprehensive record keeping

features.title: Multi
features.description: Monitor assets across Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, and other EVM-compatible networks simultaneously

features.title: Portfolio Analytics
features.description: Visualize asset allocation, performance trends, and historical value changes with interactive charts

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up notifications for balance changes, large transactions, or price movements to stay informed

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution ensures wallet addresses and holdings remain private without third-party tracking

features.title: Read
features.description: Monitor wallets without requiring private keys or seed phrases for maximum security
